channel.title: ECQ on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in ECQ on Academic

item.title: Evolutionary Quantitative Genetics 2015
item.description: This will be my third year teaching in this course, organized by Steve Arnold and Joe Felsenstein. I am teaching about Brownian motion, Bayesian vs likelihood, and Ornstein-Uhlenbeck processes. Please see the ECQ2015 site for more information. Thanks to NIMBioS and American Society of Naturalists for funding.
